fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: economy, finance, sustainability, energy, social policy, high level expert group on sustainable finance, taxonomy debate for green finance
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: We are a member of many local network organisations in the countries where we have a branch. We are a founder member of the Global Alliance for Banking on Values. Our subsidiary, Triodos Investment Management is a founder member of the Global Impact Investment Network. Furthermore, we are member of various industry organisations, including Nederlandse Vereniging van Banken, UK Finance, SIF and FeBelFin.
goals__remit:
Triodos Bank is one of the world's leading sustainable banks. Our mission is to make money work for positive social, environmental and cultural change.  
More specifically, we are in business to:  
 
- Help create a society that protects and promotes the quality of life of all its members and that has human dignity at its core  
 
- Enable individuals, organisations and businesses to use their money in ways that benefit people and the environment, and promote sustainable development  
 
- Provide our customers with innovative financial products and high quality service
